header: Create multi-app Angular in one project
content: In Angular CLI version 6 or later, we can create multiple applications in a single project or workspace.
It is suitable for an enterprise that use a single repository and configuration for all Angular projects.
<li>We can share library and configuration for all projects
• We will be got shared a node_modules folder, you don't need to run npm for each project
• We can handle with a single git repository
